quote: I always get lost in the library,' he said, 'no matter how many times I go. In fact, I think I get lost there more, the more that I go. Like it's getting to know me and revealing new passages.
quote_letters: I ALWAYS GET LOST IN THE LIBRARY HE SAID NO MATTER HOW MANY TIMES I GO IN FACT I THINK I GET LOST THERE MORE THE MORE THAT I GO LIKE ITS GETTING TO KNOW ME AND REVEALING NEW PASSAGES
